channel.title: Career! Demands! Scope? in CyberSec
channel.description:
In the interest of subject, people spends lot of time in learning and mastering stuff in this field and it would be harsh to not know what your skills can earn you or what can you do with that in future.
Lately I've been giving thoughts to if I can put my skills better use or what is the future of things I do in future. And I am sure that some point before or after the start of career, everyone have this kinda thoughts. In this situations, colleagues with higher experience and knowledge is a boon. Anybody who has opinions on the matter are welcome to share it.

item.title: Career! Demands! Scope? in CyberSec
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
